function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large number of stopover records for trains","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to frequent human contact at stopover stations","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation protocols at stopover stations, provide hygiene facilities, and enforce social distancing measures","Technologies":"Sanitation stations, automated temperature screening, contactless payment systems","People":"Passengers, station staff, commuters","Owner":"Railway operators, local health authorities"},{"Description":"High population flow from Hubei Province","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases from Hubei Province to other cities","Mitigation":"Enforce strict travel restrictions, quarantine measures, and health screenings for travelers from Hubei Province","Technologies":"Travel tracking systems, thermal scanners, quarantine facilities","People":"Travelers from Hubei Province, local residents, healthcare workers","Owner":"Local health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Population density of built-up areas","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to higher population density","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health interventions, increase access to healthcare services, and promote hygiene awareness","Technologies":"Mobile healthcare units, telemedicine services, public health awareness campaigns","People":"Residents of built-up areas, healthcare workers, local authorities","Owner":"Local health departments, city planners"}]}
